weatheRcues 0.0.0.9000
  • Get started
  • Reference

Reference

All functions

ATS_CSP()

Perform Climate Signal Processing (CSP) Site Analysis

ATS_PSR()

This function applies the PSR (Penalized Spline Regression) method to identify weather cues for a specific site using biological data. The function is based on methods adapted from Simmonds et al. It filters data for a particular site and calls the runing_psr_site function to analyze the climate and biological data.

ATS_moving_climate()

Main Function of correlation - regression and process accross all sites

ATS_peak_detection()

Apply Basic Cues Function to a Specific Site

Thresholding_algorithm()

Detect Peaks and Valleys Using a Robust Thresholding Algorithm

check_folder_and_contents()

Check Folder Existence and Contents

correlation.spearman.se()

Calculate Standard Error of Spearman Correlation

create_blocks()

Create Non-Overlapping Data Blocks

daily_parameters_rolling_climate()

Run Moving Window Regression and Correlation Analysis

extract_consecutive_sequences()

Extract Consecutive Sequences from a Vector

extract_sequences_auto()

Extract Sequences with Tolerance for Gaps

find_concurrent_period()

Perform Climate Window Analysis - based on Climate sensitivity profil from Thackeray et al note that some function have been obtained or adjusted from Thackeray et al paper OR also from Simmonds et al Find Concurrent Periods with Extreme Averages

foo()

Adjust Date for a Specific Year Range

format_climate_data()

Format Climate Data for a Specified Site

generate_reverse_day_calendar()

Generate Reverse Calendar Mapping for Days Before a Reference Date

get.mean.sd()

Get Mean and Standard Deviation of a Vector

get.min.max()

Get Minimum and Maximum of a Vector

get_predictions_windows()

Get Window Ranges from Predictions

normalize01()

Normalize Values to a Range of 0 to 1

optimize_and_fit_gam()

Optimize and Fit Generalized Additive Models (GAMs)

parameter.range()

Calculate Parameter Ranges

plot_daily_relation()

Plot Daily Weather-Seed Relationships

quibble2()

Calculate Quantiles and Return as Tibble

reformat_climate_backtothepast()

Format Climate Data for Moving Windows analysis

replace_0()

Replace Sequences of Zeros in a Vector with Neighboring Values

reruning_windows_modelling()

Re-run climate windows modeling for a specified sequence

runing_climwin()

Run Climate Window Analysis (based on climwin)

runing_csp()

Run Climate Sensitivity Profile (CSP) Window Identification for a Site

runing_daily_relationship()

Perform Moving Window Analysis for a Specific Site

runing_peak_detection()

Identify Weather Cue Windows Using Threshold-Based Peak Detection

runing_psr()

Run P-spline Regression (PSR) to Identify Weather Cues

save_window_ranges()

Save Window Ranges from Sequences of Days

se()

Calculate Standard Error

y_transformation_betareg()

Transform Response Variable for Beta Regression
